name: Expanse Range
description:
EXPANSE RANGE
A shooting range in the Expanse
Targets spawn every 10 seconds
Try you best to hit all the targets

For Ludum Dare 51
Theme: Every 10 Seconds

Move: WASD or Arrows
Look: Mouse Shoot: Left Mouse Button Aim: Right Mouse Button
Show/Hide Cursor: esc (on Windows) or Q (in web browser) 

NOTE: If the cursor is visible in the web browser version of the game try clicking in the game window and clicking the Q key

EXPANSE RANGE by Roger || projectaroid
Made using Godot, Reaper, Arturia CS-80v, sfxr by http://www.drpetter.se/project_sfxr.html, and EP Stellari Display font by Edy Pang Muhtar (dafont.com)
